3696// Enable/Disable VR experience (device or simulator)
3697void ToggleVrMode(void)
3698{
3699#if defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_33) || defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_ES2)
3700 RLGL.Vr.simulatorReady = !RLGL.Vr.simulatorReady;
3701
3702 if (!RLGL.Vr.simulatorReady)
3703 {
3704 RLGL.Vr.stereoRender = false;
3705
3706 // Reset viewport and default projection-modelview matrices
3707 rlViewport(0, 0, RLGL.State.framebufferWidth, RLGL.State.framebufferHeight);
3708 RLGL.State.projection = MatrixOrtho(0.0, RLGL.State.framebufferWidth, RLGL.State.framebufferHeight, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0);
3709 RLGL.State.modelview = MatrixIdentity();
3710 }
3711 else RLGL.Vr.stereoRender = true;
3712#endif
3713}
3714
3715// Begin VR drawing configuration
3716void BeginVrDrawing(void)
3717{
3718#if defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_33) || defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_ES2)
3719 if (RLGL.Vr.simulatorReady)
3720 {
3721 rlEnableRenderTexture(RLGL.Vr.stereoFbo.id); // Setup framebuffer for stereo rendering
3722 //glEnable(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_SRGB); // Enable SRGB framebuffer (only if required)
3723
3724 //glViewport(0, 0, buffer.width, buffer.height); // Useful if rendering to separate framebuffers (every eye)
3725 rlClearScreenBuffers(); // Clear current framebuffer
3726
3727 RLGL.Vr.stereoRender = true;
3728 }
3729#endif
3730}
3731
3732// End VR drawing process (and desktop mirror)
3733void EndVrDrawing(void)
3734{
3735#if defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_33) || defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_ES2)
3736 if (RLGL.Vr.simulatorReady)
3737 {
3738 RLGL.Vr.stereoRender = false; // Disable stereo render
3739
3740 rlDisableRenderTexture(); // Unbind current framebuffer
3741
3742 rlClearScreenBuffers(); // Clear current framebuffer
3743
3744 // Set viewport to default framebuffer size (screen size)
3745 rlViewport(0, 0, RLGL.State.framebufferWidth, RLGL.State.framebufferHeight);
3746
3747 // Let rlgl reconfigure internal matrices
3748 rlMatrixMode(RL_PROJECTION); // Enable internal projection matrix
3749 rlLoadIdentity(); // Reset internal projection matrix
3750 rlOrtho(0.0, RLGL.State.framebufferWidth, RLGL.State.framebufferHeight, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0); // Recalculate internal RLGL.State.projection matrix
3751 rlMatrixMode(RL_MODELVIEW); // Enable internal modelview matrix
3752 rlLoadIdentity(); // Reset internal modelview matrix
3753
3754 // Draw RenderTexture (RLGL.Vr.stereoFbo) using distortion shader if available
3755 if (RLGL.Vr.config.distortionShader.id > 0) RLGL.State.currentShader = RLGL.Vr.config.distortionShader;
3756 else RLGL.State.currentShader = GetShaderDefault();
3757
3758 rlEnableTexture(RLGL.Vr.stereoFbo.texture.id);
3759
3760 rlPushMatrix();
3761 rlBegin(RL_QUADS);
3762 rlColor4ub(255, 255, 255, 255);
3763 rlNormal3f(0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f);
3764
3765 // Bottom-left corner for texture and quad
3766 rlTexCoord2f(0.0f, 1.0f);
3767 rlVertex2f(0.0f, 0.0f);
3768
3769 // Bottom-right corner for texture and quad
3770 rlTexCoord2f(0.0f, 0.0f);
3771 rlVertex2f(0.0f, (float)RLGL.Vr.stereoFbo.texture.height);
3772
3773 // Top-right corner for texture and quad
3774 rlTexCoord2f(1.0f, 0.0f);
3775 rlVertex2f((float)RLGL.Vr.stereoFbo.texture.width, (float)RLGL.Vr.stereoFbo.texture.height);
3776
3777 // Top-left corner for texture and quad
3778 rlTexCoord2f(1.0f, 1.0f);
3779 rlVertex2f((float)RLGL.Vr.stereoFbo.texture.width, 0.0f);
3780 rlEnd();
3781 rlPopMatrix();
3782
3783 rlDisableTexture();
3784
3785 // Update and draw render texture fbo with distortion to backbuffer
3786 UpdateBuffersDefault();
3787 DrawBuffersDefault();
3788
3789 // Restore RLGL.State.defaultShader
3790 RLGL.State.currentShader = RLGL.State.defaultShader;
3791
3792 // Reset viewport and default projection-modelview matrices
3793 rlViewport(0, 0, RLGL.State.framebufferWidth, RLGL.State.framebufferHeight);
3794 RLGL.State.projection = MatrixOrtho(0.0, RLGL.State.framebufferWidth, RLGL.State.framebufferHeight, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0);
3795 RLGL.State.modelview = MatrixIdentity();
3796
3797 rlDisableDepthTest();
3798 }
3799#endif
3800}
3801#endif // SUPPORT_VR_SIMULATOR
3802
3803//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3804// Module specific Functions Definition
3805//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3806
3807#if defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_33) || defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_ES2)
3808// Compile custom shader and return shader id
3809static unsigned int CompileShader(const char *shaderStr, int type)
3810{
3811 unsigned int shader = glCreateShader(type);
3812 glShaderSource(shader, 1, &shaderStr, NULL);
3813
3814 GLint success = 0;
3815 glCompileShader(shader);
3816 glGetShaderiv(shader, GL_COMPILE_STATUS, &success);
3817
3818 if (success != GL_TRUE)
3819 {
3820 TRACELOG(LOG_WARNING, "SHADER: [ID %i] Failed to compile shader code", shader);
3821 int maxLength = 0;
3822 int length;
3823 glGetShaderiv(shader, GL_INFO_LOG_LENGTH, &maxLength);
3824
3825#if defined(_MSC_VER)
3826 char *log = RL_MALLOC(maxLength);
3827#else
3828 char log[maxLength];
3829#endif
3830 glGetShaderInfoLog(shader, maxLength, &length, log);
3831
3832 TRACELOG(LOG_WARNING, "SHADER: [ID %i] Compile error: %s", shader, log);
3833
3834#if defined(_MSC_VER)
3835 RL_FREE(log);
3836#endif
3837 }
3838 else TRACELOG(LOG_INFO, "SHADER: [ID %i] Compiled successfully", shader);
3839
3840 return shader;
3841}
3842
3843// Load custom shader strings and return program id
3844static unsigned int LoadShaderProgram(unsigned int vShaderId, unsigned int fShaderId)
3845{
3846 unsigned int program = 0;
3847
3848#if defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_33) || defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_ES2)
3849
3850 GLint success = 0;
3851 program = glCreateProgram();
3852
3853 glAttachShader(program, vShaderId);
3854 glAttachShader(program, fShaderId);
3855
3856 // NOTE: Default attribute shader locations must be binded before linking
3857 glBindAttribLocation(program, 0, DEFAULT_ATTRIB_POSITION_NAME);
3858 glBindAttribLocation(program, 1, DEFAULT_ATTRIB_TEXCOORD_NAME);
3859 glBindAttribLocation(program, 2, DEFAULT_ATTRIB_NORMAL_NAME);
3860 glBindAttribLocation(program, 3, DEFAULT_ATTRIB_COLOR_NAME);
3861 glBindAttribLocation(program, 4, DEFAULT_ATTRIB_TANGENT_NAME);
3862 glBindAttribLocation(program, 5, DEFAULT_ATTRIB_TEXCOORD2_NAME);
3863
3864 // NOTE: If some attrib name is no found on the shader, it locations becomes -1
3865
3866 glLinkProgram(program);
3867
3868 // NOTE: All uniform variables are intitialised to 0 when a program links
3869
3870 glGetProgramiv(program, GL_LINK_STATUS, &success);
3871
3872 if (success == GL_FALSE)
3873 {
3874 TRACELOG(LOG_WARNING, "SHADER: [ID %i] Failed to link shader program", program);
3875
3876 int maxLength = 0;
3877 int length;
3878
3879 glGetProgramiv(program, GL_INFO_LOG_LENGTH, &maxLength);
3880
3881#if defined(_MSC_VER)
3882 char *log = RL_MALLOC(maxLength);
3883#else
3884 char log[maxLength];
3885#endif
3886 glGetProgramInfoLog(program, maxLength, &length, log);
3887
3888 TRACELOG(LOG_WARNING, "SHADER: [ID %i] Link error: %s", program, log);
3889
3890#if defined(_MSC_VER)
3891 RL_FREE(log);
3892#endif
3893 glDeleteProgram(program);
3894
3895 program = 0;
3896 }
3897 else TRACELOG(LOG_INFO, "SHADER: [ID %i] Program loaded successfully", program);
3898#endif
3899 return program;
3900}
3901
3902
3903// Load default shader (just vertex positioning and texture coloring)
3904// NOTE: This shader program is used for internal buffers
3905static Shader LoadShaderDefault(void)
3906{
3907 Shader shader = { 0 };
3908 shader.locs = (int *)RL_CALLOC(MAX_SHADER_LOCATIONS, sizeof(int));
3909
3910 // NOTE: All locations must be reseted to -1 (no location)
3911 for (int i = 0; i < MAX_SHADER_LOCATIONS; i++) shader.locs[i] = -1;
3912
3913 // Vertex shader directly defined, no external file required
3914 const char *defaultVShaderStr =
3915#if defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_21)
3916 "#version 120 \n"
3917#elif defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_ES2)
3918 "#version 100 \n"
3919#endif
3920#if defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_ES2) || defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_21)
3921 "attribute vec3 vertexPosition; \n"
3922 "attribute vec2 vertexTexCoord; \n"
3923 "attribute vec4 vertexColor; \n"
3924 "varying vec2 fragTexCoord; \n"
3925 "varying vec4 fragColor; \n"
3926#elif defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_33)
3927 "#version 330 \n"
3928 "in vec3 vertexPosition; \n"
3929 "in vec2 vertexTexCoord; \n"
3930 "in vec4 vertexColor; \n"
3931 "out vec2 fragTexCoord; \n"
3932 "out vec4 fragColor; \n"
3933#endif
3934 "uniform mat4 mvp; \n"
3935 "void main() \n"
3936 "{ \n"
3937 " fragTexCoord = vertexTexCoord; \n"
3938 " fragColor = vertexColor; \n"
3939 " gl_Position = mvp*vec4(vertexPosition, 1.0); \n"
3940 "} \n";
3941
3942 // Fragment shader directly defined, no external file required
3943 const char *defaultFShaderStr =
3944#if defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_21)
3945 "#version 120 \n"
3946#elif defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_ES2)
3947 "#version 100 \n"
3948 "precision mediump float; \n" // precision required for OpenGL ES2 (WebGL)
3949#endif
3950#if defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_ES2) || defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_21)
3951 "varying vec2 fragTexCoord; \n"
3952 "varying vec4 fragColor; \n"
3953#elif defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_33)
3954 "#version 330 \n"
3955 "in vec2 fragTexCoord; \n"
3956 "in vec4 fragColor; \n"
3957 "out vec4 finalColor; \n"
3958#endif
3959 "uniform sampler2D texture0; \n"
3960 "uniform vec4 colDiffuse; \n"
3961 "void main() \n"
3962 "{ \n"
3963#if defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_ES2) || defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_21)
3964 " vec4 texelColor = texture2D(texture0, fragTexCoord); \n" // NOTE: texture2D() is deprecated on OpenGL 3.3 and ES 3.0
3965 " gl_FragColor = texelColor*colDiffuse*fragColor; \n"
3966#elif defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_33)
3967 " vec4 texelColor = texture(texture0, fragTexCoord); \n"
3968 " finalColor = texelColor*colDiffuse*fragColor; \n"
3969#endif
3970 "} \n";
3971
3972 // NOTE: Compiled vertex/fragment shaders are kept for re-use
3973 RLGL.State.defaultVShaderId = CompileShader(defaultVShaderStr, GL_VERTEX_SHADER); // Compile default vertex shader
3974 RLGL.State.defaultFShaderId = CompileShader(defaultFShaderStr, GL_FRAGMENT_SHADER); // Compile default fragment shader
3975
3976 shader.id = LoadShaderProgram(RLGL.State.defaultVShaderId, RLGL.State.defaultFShaderId);
3977
3978 if (shader.id > 0)
3979 {
3980 TRACELOG(LOG_INFO, "SHADER: [ID %i] Default shader loaded successfully", shader.id);
3981
3982 // Set default shader locations: attributes locations
3983 shader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_POSITION] = glGetAttribLocation(shader.id, "vertexPosition");
3984 shader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_TEXCOORD01] = glGetAttribLocation(shader.id, "vertexTexCoord");
3985 shader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_COLOR] = glGetAttribLocation(shader.id, "vertexColor");
3986
3987 // Set default shader locations: uniform locations
3988 shader.locs[LOC_MATRIX_MVP] = glGetUniformLocation(shader.id, "mvp");
3989 shader.locs[LOC_COLOR_DIFFUSE] = glGetUniformLocation(shader.id, "colDiffuse");
3990 shader.locs[LOC_MAP_DIFFUSE] = glGetUniformLocation(shader.id, "texture0");
3991
3992 // NOTE: We could also use below function but in case DEFAULT_ATTRIB_* points are
3993 // changed for external custom shaders, we just use direct bindings above
3994 //SetShaderDefaultLocations(&shader);
3995 }
3996 else TRACELOG(LOG_WARNING, "SHADER: [ID %i] Failed to load default shader", shader.id);
3997
3998 return shader;
3999}
4000
4001// Get location handlers to for shader attributes and uniforms
4002// NOTE: If any location is not found, loc point becomes -1
4003static void SetShaderDefaultLocations(Shader *shader)
4004{
4005 // NOTE: Default shader attrib locations have been fixed before linking:
4006 // vertex position location = 0
4007 // vertex texcoord location = 1
4008 // vertex normal location = 2
4009 // vertex color location = 3
4010 // vertex tangent location = 4
4011 // vertex texcoord2 location = 5
4012
4013 // Get handles to GLSL input attibute locations
4014 shader->locs[LOC_VERTEX_POSITION] = glGetAttribLocation(shader->id, DEFAULT_ATTRIB_POSITION_NAME);
4015 shader->locs[LOC_VERTEX_TEXCOORD01] = glGetAttribLocation(shader->id, DEFAULT_ATTRIB_TEXCOORD_NAME);
4016 shader->locs[LOC_VERTEX_TEXCOORD02] = glGetAttribLocation(shader->id, DEFAULT_ATTRIB_TEXCOORD2_NAME);
4017 shader->locs[LOC_VERTEX_NORMAL] = glGetAttribLocation(shader->id, DEFAULT_ATTRIB_NORMAL_NAME);
4018 shader->locs[LOC_VERTEX_TANGENT] = glGetAttribLocation(shader->id, DEFAULT_ATTRIB_TANGENT_NAME);
4019 shader->locs[LOC_VERTEX_COLOR] = glGetAttribLocation(shader->id, DEFAULT_ATTRIB_COLOR_NAME);
4020
4021 // Get handles to GLSL uniform locations (vertex shader)
4022 shader->locs[LOC_MATRIX_MVP] = glGetUniformLocation(shader->id, "mvp");
4023 shader->locs[LOC_MATRIX_PROJECTION] = glGetUniformLocation(shader->id, "projection");
4024 shader->locs[LOC_MATRIX_VIEW] = glGetUniformLocation(shader->id, "view");
4025
4026 // Get handles to GLSL uniform locations (fragment shader)
4027 shader->locs[LOC_COLOR_DIFFUSE] = glGetUniformLocation(shader->id, "colDiffuse");
4028 shader->locs[LOC_MAP_DIFFUSE] = glGetUniformLocation(shader->id, "texture0");
4029 shader->locs[LOC_MAP_SPECULAR] = glGetUniformLocation(shader->id, "texture1");
4030 shader->locs[LOC_MAP_NORMAL] = glGetUniformLocation(shader->id, "texture2");
4031}
4032
4033// Unload default shader
4034static void UnloadShaderDefault(void)
4035{
4036 glUseProgram(0);
4037
4038 glDetachShader(RLGL.State.defaultShader.id, RLGL.State.defaultVShaderId);
4039 glDetachShader(RLGL.State.defaultShader.id, RLGL.State.defaultFShaderId);
4040 glDeleteShader(RLGL.State.defaultVShaderId);
4041 glDeleteShader(RLGL.State.defaultFShaderId);
4042
4043 glDeleteProgram(RLGL.State.defaultShader.id);
4044}
4045
4046// Load default internal buffers
4047static void LoadBuffersDefault(void)
4048{
4049 // Initialize CPU (RAM) arrays (vertex position, texcoord, color data and indexes)
4050 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4051 for (int i = 0; i < MAX_BATCH_BUFFERING; i++)
4052 {
4053 RLGL.State.vertexData[i].vertices = (float *)RL_MALLOC(sizeof(float)*3*4*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS); // 3 float by vertex, 4 vertex by quad
4054 RLGL.State.vertexData[i].texcoords = (float *)RL_MALLOC(sizeof(float)*2*4*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS); // 2 float by texcoord, 4 texcoord by quad
4055 RLGL.State.vertexData[i].colors = (unsigned char *)RL_MALLOC(sizeof(unsigned char)*4*4*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS); // 4 float by color, 4 colors by quad
4056#if defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_33)
4057 RLGL.State.vertexData[i].indices = (unsigned int *)RL_MALLOC(sizeof(unsigned int)*6*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS); // 6 int by quad (indices)
4058#elif defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_ES2)
4059 RLGL.State.vertexData[i].indices = (unsigned short *)RL_MALLOC(sizeof(unsigned short)*6*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS); // 6 int by quad (indices)
4060#endif
4061
4062 for (int j = 0; j < (3*4*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS); j++) RLGL.State.vertexData[i].vertices[j] = 0.0f;
4063 for (int j = 0; j < (2*4*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS); j++) RLGL.State.vertexData[i].texcoords[j] = 0.0f;
4064 for (int j = 0; j < (4*4*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS); j++) RLGL.State.vertexData[i].colors[j] = 0;
4065
4066 int k = 0;
4067
4068 // Indices can be initialized right now
4069 for (int j = 0; j < (6*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS); j += 6)
4070 {
4071 RLGL.State.vertexData[i].indices[j] = 4*k;
4072 RLGL.State.vertexData[i].indices[j + 1] = 4*k + 1;
4073 RLGL.State.vertexData[i].indices[j + 2] = 4*k + 2;
4074 RLGL.State.vertexData[i].indices[j + 3] = 4*k;
4075 RLGL.State.vertexData[i].indices[j + 4] = 4*k + 2;
4076 RLGL.State.vertexData[i].indices[j + 5] = 4*k + 3;
4077
4078 k++;
4079 }
4080
4081 RLGL.State.vertexData[i].vCounter = 0;
4082 RLGL.State.vertexData[i].tcCounter = 0;
4083 RLGL.State.vertexData[i].cCounter = 0;
4084 }
4085
4086 TRACELOG(LOG_INFO, "RLGL: Internal vertex buffers initialized successfully in RAM (CPU)");
4087 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4088
4089 // Upload to GPU (VRAM) vertex data and initialize VAOs/VBOs
4090 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4091 for (int i = 0; i < MAX_BATCH_BUFFERING; i++)
4092 {
4093 if (RLGL.ExtSupported.vao)
4094 {
4095 // Initialize Quads VAO
4096 glGenVertexArrays(1, &RLGL.State.vertexData[i].vaoId);
4097 glBindVertexArray(RLGL.State.vertexData[i].vaoId);
4098 }
4099
4100 // Quads - Vertex buffers binding and attributes enable
4101 // Vertex position buffer (shader-location = 0)
4102 glGenBuffers(1, &RLGL.State.vertexData[i].vboId[0]);
4103 glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, RLGL.State.vertexData[i].vboId[0]);
4104 glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(float)*3*4*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS, RLGL.State.vertexData[i].vertices, GL_DYNAMIC_DRAW);
4105 glEnableVertexAttribArray(RLGL.State.currentShader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_POSITION]);
4106 glVertexAttribPointer(RLGL.State.currentShader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_POSITION], 3, GL_FLOAT, 0, 0, 0);
4107
4108 // Vertex texcoord buffer (shader-location = 1)
4109 glGenBuffers(1, &RLGL.State.vertexData[i].vboId[1]);
4110 glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, RLGL.State.vertexData[i].vboId[1]);
4111 glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(float)*2*4*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS, RLGL.State.vertexData[i].texcoords, GL_DYNAMIC_DRAW);
4112 glEnableVertexAttribArray(RLGL.State.currentShader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_TEXCOORD01]);
4113 glVertexAttribPointer(RLGL.State.currentShader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_TEXCOORD01], 2, GL_FLOAT, 0, 0, 0);
4114
4115 // Vertex color buffer (shader-location = 3)
4116 glGenBuffers(1, &RLGL.State.vertexData[i].vboId[2]);
4117 glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, RLGL.State.vertexData[i].vboId[2]);
4118 glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(unsigned char)*4*4*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS, RLGL.State.vertexData[i].colors, GL_DYNAMIC_DRAW);
4119 glEnableVertexAttribArray(RLGL.State.currentShader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_COLOR]);
4120 glVertexAttribPointer(RLGL.State.currentShader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_COLOR], 4, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, GL_TRUE, 0, 0);
4121
4122 // Fill index buffer
4123 glGenBuffers(1, &RLGL.State.vertexData[i].vboId[3]);
4124 glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, RLGL.State.vertexData[i].vboId[3]);
4125#if defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_33)
4126 glBufferData(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(int)*6*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS, RLGL.State.vertexData[i].indices, GL_STATIC_DRAW);
4127#elif defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_ES2)
4128 glBufferData(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(short)*6*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS, RLGL.State.vertexData[i].indices, GL_STATIC_DRAW);
4129#endif
4130 }
4131
4132 TRACELOG(LOG_INFO, "RLGL: Internal vertex buffers uploaded successfully to VRAM (GPU)");
4133
4134 // Unbind the current VAO
4135 if (RLGL.ExtSupported.vao) glBindVertexArray(0);
4136 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4137}
4138
4139// Update default internal buffers (VAOs/VBOs) with vertex array data
4140// NOTE: If there is not vertex data, buffers doesn't need to be updated (vertexCount > 0)
4141// TODO: If no data changed on the CPU arrays --> No need to re-update GPU arrays (change flag required)
4142static void UpdateBuffersDefault(void)
4143{
4144 // Update vertex buffers data
4145 if (RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].vCounter > 0)
4146 {
4147 // Activate elements VAO
4148 if (RLGL.ExtSupported.vao) glBindVertexArray(RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].vaoId);
4149
4150 // Vertex positions buffer
4151 glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].vboId[0]);
4152 glBufferSubData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0, sizeof(float)*3*RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].vCounter, RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].vertices);
4153 //glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(float)*3*4*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS, RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].vertices, GL_DYNAMIC_DRAW); // Update all buffer
4154
4155 // Texture coordinates buffer
4156 glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].vboId[1]);
4157 glBufferSubData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0, sizeof(float)*2*RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].vCounter, RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].texcoords);
4158 //glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(float)*2*4*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS, RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].texcoords, GL_DYNAMIC_DRAW); // Update all buffer
4159
4160 // Colors buffer
4161 glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].vboId[2]);
4162 glBufferSubData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0, sizeof(unsigned char)*4*RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].vCounter, RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].colors);
4163 //glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(float)*4*4*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS, RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].colors, GL_DYNAMIC_DRAW); // Update all buffer
4164
4165 // NOTE: glMapBuffer() causes sync issue.
4166 // If GPU is working with this buffer, glMapBuffer() will wait(stall) until GPU to finish its job.
4167 // To avoid waiting (idle), you can call first glBufferData() with NULL pointer before glMapBuffer().
4168 // If you do that, the previous data in PBO will be discarded and glMapBuffer() returns a new
4169 // allocated pointer immediately even if GPU is still working with the previous data.
4170
4171 // Another option: map the buffer object into client's memory
4172 // Probably this code could be moved somewhere else...
4173 // RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].vertices = (float *)glMapBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, GL_READ_WRITE);
4174 // if (RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].vertices)
4175 // {
4176 // Update vertex data
4177 // }
4178 // glUnmapBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER);
4179
4180 // Unbind the current VAO
4181 if (RLGL.ExtSupported.vao) glBindVertexArray(0);
4182 }
4183}
4184
4185// Draw default internal buffers vertex data
4186static void DrawBuffersDefault(void)
4187{
4188 Matrix matProjection = RLGL.State.projection;
4189 Matrix matModelView = RLGL.State.modelview;
4190
4191 int eyesCount = 1;
4192#if defined(SUPPORT_VR_SIMULATOR)
4193 if (RLGL.Vr.stereoRender) eyesCount = 2;
4194#endif
4195
4196 for (int eye = 0; eye < eyesCount; eye++)
4197 {
4198#if defined(SUPPORT_VR_SIMULATOR)
4199 if (eyesCount == 2) SetStereoView(eye, matProjection, matModelView);
4200#endif
4201
4202 // Draw buffers
4203 if (RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].vCounter > 0)
4204 {
4205 // Set current shader and upload current MVP matrix
4206 glUseProgram(RLGL.State.currentShader.id);
4207
4208 // Create modelview-projection matrix
4209 Matrix matMVP = MatrixMultiply(RLGL.State.modelview, RLGL.State.projection);
4210
4211 glUniformMatrix4fv(RLGL.State.currentShader.locs[LOC_MATRIX_MVP], 1, false, MatrixToFloat(matMVP));
4212 glUniform4f(RLGL.State.currentShader.locs[LOC_COLOR_DIFFUSE], 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);
4213 glUniform1i(RLGL.State.currentShader.locs[LOC_MAP_DIFFUSE], 0); // Provided value refers to the texture unit (active)
4214
4215 // TODO: Support additional texture units on custom shader
4216 //if (RLGL.State.currentShader->locs[LOC_MAP_SPECULAR] > 0) glUniform1i(RLGL.State.currentShader.locs[LOC_MAP_SPECULAR], 1);
4217 //if (RLGL.State.currentShader->locs[LOC_MAP_NORMAL] > 0) glUniform1i(RLGL.State.currentShader.locs[LOC_MAP_NORMAL], 2);
4218
4219 // NOTE: Right now additional map textures not considered for default buffers drawing
4220
4221 int vertexOffset = 0;
4222
4223 if (RLGL.ExtSupported.vao) glBindVertexArray(RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].vaoId);
4224 else
4225 {
4226 // Bind vertex attrib: position (shader-location = 0)
4227 glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].vboId[0]);
4228 glVertexAttribPointer(RLGL.State.currentShader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_POSITION], 3, GL_FLOAT, 0, 0, 0);
4229 glEnableVertexAttribArray(RLGL.State.currentShader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_POSITION]);
4230
4231 // Bind vertex attrib: texcoord (shader-location = 1)
4232 glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].vboId[1]);
4233 glVertexAttribPointer(RLGL.State.currentShader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_TEXCOORD01], 2, GL_FLOAT, 0, 0, 0);
4234 glEnableVertexAttribArray(RLGL.State.currentShader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_TEXCOORD01]);
4235
4236 // Bind vertex attrib: color (shader-location = 3)
4237 glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].vboId[2]);
4238 glVertexAttribPointer(RLGL.State.currentShader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_COLOR], 4, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, GL_TRUE, 0, 0);
4239 glEnableVertexAttribArray(RLGL.State.currentShader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_COLOR]);
4240
4241 glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].vboId[3]);
4242 }
4243
4244 glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0);
4245
4246 for (int i = 0; i < RLGL.State.drawsCounter; i++)
4247 {
4248 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, RLGL.State.draws[i].textureId);
4249
4250 // TODO: Find some way to bind additional textures --> Use global texture IDs? Register them on draw[i]?
4251 //if (RLGL.State.currentShader->locs[LOC_MAP_SPECULAR] > 0) { glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE1); glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, textureUnit1_id); }
4252 //if (RLGL.State.currentShader->locs[LOC_MAP_SPECULAR] > 0) { glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE2); glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, textureUnit2_id); }
4253
4254 if ((RLGL.State.draws[i].mode == RL_LINES) || (RLGL.State.draws[i].mode == RL_TRIANGLES)) glDrawArrays(RLGL.State.draws[i].mode, vertexOffset, RLGL.State.draws[i].vertexCount);
4255 else
4256 {
4257#if defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_33)
4258 // We need to define the number of indices to be processed: quadsCount*6
4259 // NOTE: The final parameter tells the GPU the offset in bytes from the
4260 // start of the index buffer to the location of the first index to process
4261 glDrawElements(GL_TRIANGLES, RLGL.State.draws[i].vertexCount/4*6, GL_UNSIGNED_INT, (GLvoid *)(sizeof(GLuint)*vertexOffset/4*6));
4262#elif defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_ES2)
4263 glDrawElements(GL_TRIANGLES, RLGL.State.draws[i].vertexCount/4*6, GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT, (GLvoid *)(sizeof(GLushort)*vertexOffset/4*6));
4264#endif
4265 }
4266
4267 vertexOffset += (RLGL.State.draws[i].vertexCount + RLGL.State.draws[i].vertexAlignment);
4268 }
4269
4270 if (!RLGL.ExtSupported.vao)
4271 {
4272 glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0);
4273 glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0);
4274 }
4275
4276 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0); // Unbind textures
4277 }
4278
4279 if (RLGL.ExtSupported.vao) glBindVertexArray(0); // Unbind VAO
4280
4281 glUseProgram(0); // Unbind shader program
4282 }
4283
4284 // Reset vertex counters for next frame
4285 RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].vCounter = 0;
4286 RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].tcCounter = 0;
4287 RLGL.State.vertexData[RLGL.State.currentBuffer].cCounter = 0;
4288
4289 // Reset depth for next draw
4290 RLGL.State.currentDepth = -1.0f;
4291
4292 // Restore projection/modelview matrices
4293 RLGL.State.projection = matProjection;
4294 RLGL.State.modelview = matModelView;
4295
4296 // Reset RLGL.State.draws array
4297 for (int i = 0; i < MAX_DRAWCALL_REGISTERED; i++)
4298 {
4299 RLGL.State.draws[i].mode = RL_QUADS;
4300 RLGL.State.draws[i].vertexCount = 0;
4301 RLGL.State.draws[i].textureId = RLGL.State.defaultTextureId;
4302 }
4303
4304 RLGL.State.drawsCounter = 1;
4305
4306 // Change to next buffer in the list
4307 RLGL.State.currentBuffer++;
4308 if (RLGL.State.currentBuffer >= MAX_BATCH_BUFFERING) RLGL.State.currentBuffer = 0;
4309}
4310
4311// Unload default internal buffers vertex data from CPU and GPU
4312static void UnloadBuffersDefault(void)
4313{
4314 // Unbind everything
4315 if (RLGL.ExtSupported.vao) glBindVertexArray(0);
4316 glDisableVertexAttribArray(0);
4317 glDisableVertexAttribArray(1);
4318 glDisableVertexAttribArray(2);
4319 glDisableVertexAttribArray(3);
4320 glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0);
4321 glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0);
4322
4323 for (int i = 0; i < MAX_BATCH_BUFFERING; i++)
4324 {
4325 // Delete VBOs from GPU (VRAM)
4326 glDeleteBuffers(1, &RLGL.State.vertexData[i].vboId[0]);
4327 glDeleteBuffers(1, &RLGL.State.vertexData[i].vboId[1]);
4328 glDeleteBuffers(1, &RLGL.State.vertexData[i].vboId[2]);
4329 glDeleteBuffers(1, &RLGL.State.vertexData[i].vboId[3]);
4330
4331 // Delete VAOs from GPU (VRAM)
4332 if (RLGL.ExtSupported.vao) glDeleteVertexArrays(1, &RLGL.State.vertexData[i].vaoId);
4333
4334 // Free vertex arrays memory from CPU (RAM)
4335 RL_FREE(RLGL.State.vertexData[i].vertices);
4336 RL_FREE(RLGL.State.vertexData[i].texcoords);
4337 RL_FREE(RLGL.State.vertexData[i].colors);
4338 RL_FREE(RLGL.State.vertexData[i].indices);
4339 }
4340}
4341
4342// Renders a 1x1 XY quad in NDC
4343static void GenDrawQuad(void)
4344{
4345 unsigned int quadVAO = 0;
4346 unsigned int quadVBO = 0;
4347
4348 float vertices[] = {
4349 // Positions // Texture Coords
4350 -1.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f,
4351 -1.0f, -1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f,
4352 1.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f,
4353 1.0f, -1.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f,
4354 };
4355
4356 // Set up plane VAO
4357 glGenVertexArrays(1, &quadVAO);
4358 glGenBuffers(1, &quadVBO);
4359 glBindVertexArray(quadVAO);
4360
4361 // Fill buffer
4362 glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, quadVBO);
4363 glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(vertices), &vertices, GL_STATIC_DRAW);
4364
4365 // Link vertex attributes
4366 glEnableVertexAttribArray(0);
4367 glVertexAttribPointer(0, 3, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, 5*sizeof(float), (void *)0);
4368 glEnableVertexAttribArray(1);
4369 glVertexAttribPointer(1, 2, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, 5*sizeof(float), (void *)(3*sizeof(float)));
4370
4371 // Draw quad
4372 glBindVertexArray(quadVAO);
4373 glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP, 0, 4);
4374 glBindVertexArray(0);
4375
4376 glDeleteBuffers(1, &quadVBO);
4377 glDeleteVertexArrays(1, &quadVAO);
4378}

4421 -1.0f, 1.0f, -1.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f,
4422 -1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f
4423 };
4424
4425 // Set up cube VAO
4426 glGenVertexArrays(1, &cubeVAO);
4427 glGenBuffers(1, &cubeVBO);
4428
4429 // Fill buffer
4430 glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, cubeVBO);
4431 glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(vertices), vertices, GL_STATIC_DRAW);
4432
4433 // Link vertex attributes
4434 glBindVertexArray(cubeVAO);
4435 glEnableVertexAttribArray(0);
4436 glVertexAttribPointer(0, 3, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, 8*sizeof(float), (void *)0);
4437 glEnableVertexAttribArray(1);
4438 glVertexAttribPointer(1, 3, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, 8*sizeof(float), (void *)(3*sizeof(float)));
4439 glEnableVertexAttribArray(2);
4440 glVertexAttribPointer(2, 2, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, 8*sizeof(float), (void *)(6*sizeof(float)));
4441 glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0);
4442 glBindVertexArray(0);
4443
4444 // Draw cube
4445 glBindVertexArray(cubeVAO);
4446 glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLES, 0, 36);
4447 glBindVertexArray(0);
4448
4449 glDeleteBuffers(1, &cubeVBO);
4450 glDeleteVertexArrays(1, &cubeVAO);
4451}

4453#if defined(SUPPORT_VR_SIMULATOR)
4454// Set internal projection and modelview matrix depending on eyes tracking data
4455static void SetStereoView(int eye, Matrix matProjection, Matrix matModelView)
4456{
4457 Matrix eyeProjection = matProjection;
4458 Matrix eyeModelView = matModelView;
4459
4460 // Setup viewport and projection/modelview matrices using tracking data
4461 rlViewport(eye*RLGL.State.framebufferWidth/2, 0, RLGL.State.framebufferWidth/2, RLGL.State.framebufferHeight);
4462
4463 // Apply view offset to modelview matrix
4464 eyeModelView = MatrixMultiply(matModelView, RLGL.Vr.config.eyesViewOffset[eye]);
4465
4466 // Set current eye projection matrix
4467 eyeProjection = RLGL.Vr.config.eyesProjection[eye];
4468
4469 SetMatrixModelview(eyeModelView);
4470 SetMatrixProjection(eyeProjection);
4471}

4476#if defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_11)
4477// Mipmaps data is generated after image data
4478// NOTE: Only works with RGBA (4 bytes) data!
4479static int GenerateMipmaps(unsigned char *data, int baseWidth, int baseHeight)
4480{
4481 int mipmapCount = 1; // Required mipmap levels count (including base level)
4482 int width = baseWidth;
4483 int height = baseHeight;
4484 int size = baseWidth*baseHeight*4; // Size in bytes (will include mipmaps...), RGBA only
4485
4486 // Count mipmap levels required
4487 while ((width != 1) && (height != 1))
4488 {
4489 if (width != 1) width /= 2;
4490 if (height != 1) height /= 2;
4491
4492 TRACELOGD("TEXTURE: Next mipmap size: %i x %i", width, height);
4493
4494 mipmapCount++;
4495
4496 size += (width*height*4); // Add mipmap size (in bytes)
4497 }
4498
4499 TRACELOGD("TEXTURE: Total mipmaps required: %i", mipmapCount);
4500 TRACELOGD("TEXTURE: Total size of data required: %i", size);
4501
4502 unsigned char *temp = RL_REALLOC(data, size);
4503
4504 if (temp != NULL) data = temp;
4505 else TRACELOG(LOG_WARNING, "TEXTURE: Failed to allocate required mipmaps memory");
4506
4507 width = baseWidth;
4508 height = baseHeight;
4509 size = (width*height*4);
4510
4511 // Generate mipmaps
4512 // NOTE: Every mipmap data is stored after data
4513 Color *image = (Color *)RL_MALLOC(width*height*sizeof(Color));
4514 Color *mipmap = NULL;
4515 int offset = 0;
4516 int j = 0;
4517
4518 for (int i = 0; i < size; i += 4)
4519 {
4520 image[j].r = data[i];
4521 image[j].g = data[i + 1];
4522 image[j].b = data[i + 2];
4523 image[j].a = data[i + 3];
4524 j++;
4525 }
4526
4527 TRACELOGD("TEXTURE: Mipmap base size (%ix%i)", width, height);
4528
4529 for (int mip = 1; mip < mipmapCount; mip++)
4530 {
4531 mipmap = GenNextMipmap(image, width, height);
4532
4533 offset += (width*height*4); // Size of last mipmap
4534 j = 0;
4535
4536 width /= 2;
4537 height /= 2;
4538 size = (width*height*4); // Mipmap size to store after offset
4539
4540 // Add mipmap to data
4541 for (int i = 0; i < size; i += 4)
4542 {
4543 data[offset + i] = mipmap[j].r;
4544 data[offset + i + 1] = mipmap[j].g;
4545 data[offset + i + 2] = mipmap[j].b;
4546 data[offset + i + 3] = mipmap[j].a;
4547 j++;
4548 }
4549
4550 RL_FREE(image);
4551
4552 image = mipmap;
4553 mipmap = NULL;
4554 }
4555
4556 RL_FREE(mipmap); // free mipmap data
4557
4558 return mipmapCount;
4559}
4560
4561// Manual mipmap generation (basic scaling algorithm)
4562static Color *GenNextMipmap(Color *srcData, int srcWidth, int srcHeight)
4563{
4564 int x2, y2;
4565 Color prow, pcol;
4566
4567 int width = srcWidth/2;
4568 int height = srcHeight/2;
4569
4570 Color *mipmap = (Color *)RL_MALLOC(width*height*sizeof(Color));
4571
4572 // Scaling algorithm works perfectly (box-filter)
4573 for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)
4574 {
4575 y2 = 2*y;
4576
4577 for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)
4578 {
4579 x2 = 2*x;
4580
4581 prow.r = (srcData[y2*srcWidth + x2].r + srcData[y2*srcWidth + x2 + 1].r)/2;
4582 prow.g = (srcData[y2*srcWidth + x2].g + srcData[y2*srcWidth + x2 + 1].g)/2;
4583 prow.b = (srcData[y2*srcWidth + x2].b + srcData[y2*srcWidth + x2 + 1].b)/2;
4584 prow.a = (srcData[y2*srcWidth + x2].a + srcData[y2*srcWidth + x2 + 1].a)/2;
4585
4586 pcol.r = (srcData[(y2+1)*srcWidth + x2].r + srcData[(y2+1)*srcWidth + x2 + 1].r)/2;
4587 pcol.g = (srcData[(y2+1)*srcWidth + x2].g + srcData[(y2+1)*srcWidth + x2 + 1].g)/2;
4588 pcol.b = (srcData[(y2+1)*srcWidth + x2].b + srcData[(y2+1)*srcWidth + x2 + 1].b)/2;
4589 pcol.a = (srcData[(y2+1)*srcWidth + x2].a + srcData[(y2+1)*srcWidth + x2 + 1].a)/2;
4590
4591 mipmap[y*width + x].r = (prow.r + pcol.r)/2;
4592 mipmap[y*width + x].g = (prow.g + pcol.g)/2;
4593 mipmap[y*width + x].b = (prow.b + pcol.b)/2;
4594 mipmap[y*width + x].a = (prow.a + pcol.a)/2;
4595 }
4596 }
4597
4598 TRACELOGD("TEXTURE: Mipmap generated successfully (%ix%i)", width, height);
4599
4600 return mipmap;
4601}
4602#endif

4604#if defined(RLGL_STANDALONE)
4605// Load text data from file, returns a '\0' terminated string
4606// NOTE: text chars array should be freed manually
4607char *LoadFileText(const char *fileName)
4608{
4609 char *text = NULL;
4610
4611 if (fileName != NULL)
4612 {
4613 FILE *textFile = fopen(fileName, "rt");
4614
4615 if (textFile != NULL)
4616 {
4617 // WARNING: When reading a file as 'text' file,
4618 // text mode causes carriage return-linefeed translation...
4619 // ...but using fseek() should return correct byte-offset
4620 fseek(textFile, 0, SEEK_END);
4621 int size = ftell(textFile);
4622 fseek(textFile, 0, SEEK_SET);
4623
4624 if (size > 0)
4625 {
4626 text = (char *)RL_MALLOC(sizeof(char)*(size + 1));
4627 int count = fread(text, sizeof(char), size, textFile);
4628
4629 // WARNING: \r\n is converted to \n on reading, so,
4630 // read bytes count gets reduced by the number of lines
4631 if (count < size) text = RL_REALLOC(text, count + 1);
4632
4633 // Zero-terminate the string
4634 text[count] = '\0';
4635
4636 TRACELOG(LOG_INFO, "FILEIO: [%s] Text file loaded successfully", fileName);
4637 }
4638 else TRACELOG(LOG_WARNING, "FILEIO: [%s] Failed to read text file", fileName);
4639
4640 fclose(textFile);
4641 }
4642 else TRACELOG(LOG_WARNING, "FILEIO: [%s] Failed to open text file", fileName);
4643 }
4644 else TRACELOG(LOG_WARNING, "FILEIO: File name provided is not valid");
4645
4646 return text;
4647}
4648
4649// Get pixel data size in bytes (image or texture)
4650// NOTE: Size depends on pixel format
4651int GetPixelDataSize(int width, int height, int format)
4652{
4653 int dataSize = 0; // Size in bytes
4654 int bpp = 0; // Bits per pixel
4655
4656 switch (format)
4657 {
4658 case UNCOMPRESSED_GRAYSCALE: bpp = 8; break;
4659 case UNCOMPRESSED_GRAY_ALPHA:
4660 case UNCOMPRESSED_R5G6B5:
4661 case UNCOMPRESSED_R5G5B5A1:
4662 case UNCOMPRESSED_R4G4B4A4: bpp = 16; break;
4663 case UNCOMPRESSED_R8G8B8A8: bpp = 32; break;
4664 case UNCOMPRESSED_R8G8B8: bpp = 24; break;
4665 case UNCOMPRESSED_R32: bpp = 32; break;
4666 case UNCOMPRESSED_R32G32B32: bpp = 32*3; break;
4667 case UNCOMPRESSED_R32G32B32A32: bpp = 32*4; break;
4668 case COMPRESSED_DXT1_RGB:
4669 case COMPRESSED_DXT1_RGBA:
4670 case COMPRESSED_ETC1_RGB:
4671 case COMPRESSED_ETC2_RGB:
4672 case COMPRESSED_PVRT_RGB:
4673 case COMPRESSED_PVRT_RGBA: bpp = 4; break;
4674 case COMPRESSED_DXT3_RGBA:
4675 case COMPRESSED_DXT5_RGBA:
4676 case COMPRESSED_ETC2_EAC_RGBA:
4677 case COMPRESSED_ASTC_4x4_RGBA: bpp = 8; break;
4678 case COMPRESSED_ASTC_8x8_RGBA: bpp = 2; break;
4679 default: break;
4680 }
4681
4682 dataSize = width*height*bpp/8; // Total data size in bytes
4683
4684 // Most compressed formats works on 4x4 blocks,
4685 // if texture is smaller, minimum dataSize is 8 or 16
4686 if ((width < 4) && (height < 4))
4687 {
4688 if ((format >= COMPRESSED_DXT1_RGB) && (format < COMPRESSED_DXT3_RGBA)) dataSize = 8;
4689 else if ((format >= COMPRESSED_DXT3_RGBA) && (format < COMPRESSED_ASTC_8x8_RGBA)) dataSize = 16;
4690 }
4691
4692 return dataSize;
4693}
